title: I am going to buy a smartphone now. Should I buy 4G or 5G, or should I wait a bit? - Quora

response.answer_text: Depends on your budget. In reality if our 4g network in India are giving 3g speed. If your budget is High definitely go for 5g Or buy a 15 k mobile device with 6 gb ram with128 gb internal atleast 720/730 snapdragon+ processor battery 5k+ definitely 35w + fast changing / super vooc etc. With Camera as required.
